minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">首先来解释同步和异步的概念</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;

minor-fareast;mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">这两个概念与消息的通知机制有关</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-theme-font:minor-fareast;
